```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(flexdashboard)
```

```{r}
clues <- read_tsv("./data/master_season1-35.tsv")
```


```{r}
clean <- clues %>% 
  select(category, answer, question)
answers <- clean %>% 
  select(answer)
years_data <- answers %>% 
  mutate(years = str_extract(answer, "[0-9]{4}")) %>%
  filter(str_count(years)==4) %>% 
  arrange(desc(years)) %>% 
  ungroup()

years2 <- as.numeric(years_data$years)

joined <- merge(years2, years_data)

years_data
```

```{r}
years_data <- years_data %>% 
  slice(413:84470) %>% 
  group_by(years) %>% 
  mutate(count = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count)) %>% 
  ungroup()
view(years_data)
```

```{r}
# trying out a variety of sample plots 

ggplot(years2, aes(x = years)) +
  stat_count(mapping = aes(x = years))

ggplot(years2, aes(x = years, y = count)) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(years2, aes(x = years, y = count)) +
  geom_col()

ggplot(years2, aes(x = years, y = count)) +
  geom_line()
  
```
